Package dataAccess

Class AuthDAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.AuthDAO
public class AuthDAO extends Object
Responsible for handling authentication-related data operations.

      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • insertToken

      public void insertToken(String token, String userId) throws DataAccessException
      Inserts a new token for a user.
      Parameters:
      token - The user's authentication token.
      userId - The user ID for the associated user.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • deleteToken

      public void deleteToken(String token) throws DataAccessException
      Removes a token, typically during logout.
      Parameters:
      token - The authentication token to be removed.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • validateToken

      public boolean validateToken(String token) throws DataAccessException
      Validates if a given token is still valid.
      Parameters:
      token - The authentication token to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • insertGame

      public void insertGame(Game game) throws DataAccessException
      Inserts a new game into the database.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object to be inserted.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • findGame

      public Game findGame(String gameId) throws DataAccessException
      Retrieves a specified game from the database by gameID.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The game object, null if not found.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • findAllGames

      public List<Game> findAllGames() throws DataAccessException
      Retrieves all games from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all games.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • claimSpot

      public void claimSpot(String gameId, String username) throws DataAccessException
      Claims a spot in the game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The game ID of the spot to be claimed.
      username - The username of the player claiming the spot.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame(String gameId, Game newGame) throws DataAccessException
      Updates a game in the database.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game to be updated.
      newGame - The updated game object.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(String gameId) throws DataAccessException
      Removes a game from the database.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game to be removed.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.

    • clear

      public void clear() throws DataAccessException
      Clears all data from the database.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there's an error in the data access operation.
